text: Entolongweni apho kwangena amadodana amabini kunye naye, enye kuwo yathi: “ Inene mna ndizibone (ephupheni) ndixova iwayini.” Enye yathi: “Inene mna ephupheni ndizibone ndithwele izonka ngengobozi, iintaka zisidla kuzo apho. Khawusichazele intsingiselo yoku. Inene sikubona wena ungomnye wabenzi bokulungileyo.”
